outputs.name: win_par
outputs.description:
Window Parameters that can be applied to a Dragonfly object
using the "DF Apply Facade Parameters" component.

inputs.name: _ratio
inputs.description:
A number between 0 and 1 for the ratio between the window
area and the parent wall surface area.

name: DF Simple Window Ratio Parameters
description:
Create Dragonfly window parameters with instructions for a single window using
an area ratio with the base surface.
-
